credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James O. Green and Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Raccolta di Componenti Poetici per le Felicissime Nozze di sue Eccellenze li Signori Marin Cavalli e Maria Dolfin, dedicata a S. S. E. E. li Signori Lunardo Dolfin e Maria Pisani Dolfin
medium: Black ink engraving on rolled laid paper
description: Formerly 1980-32-1764? Collection of poems in honor of the marriage of Marin Cavalli and Maria Dolfin. Quarto. Frontispiece signed. Vignette on title-page, signed; historiated initial. Numerous wood-cut vignettes. The dedication is signed Giuseppe Pasini
name: festival, marriage book
